# indexSearch

**Type Property**

A constant for adding the magnifying glass icon to the section index of a table view.

## Declaration

```swift
class let indexSearch: String
```

## Discussion

If the data source includes this constant string in the array of strings it returns in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDataSource/sectionIndexTitles(for:)], the section index displays a magnifying glass icon at the corresponding index location. This location should generally be the first title in the index.

## Configuring the table index

- **sectionIndexMinimumDisplayRowCount**: The number of table rows at which to display the index list on the right edge of the table.
- **sectionIndexColor**: The color to use for the table view’s index text.
- **sectionIndexBackgroundColor**: The color to use for the background of the table view’s section index.
- **sectionIndexTrackingBackgroundColor**: The color to use for the table view’s index background area.
